name: dire-hit
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Increases the target’s critical hit chance by one stage until it leaves the field. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Increases the chance of a critical hit in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the critical-hit ratio during one battle.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the critical-hit ratio during one battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Raises the critical-hit ratio of POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON is withdrawn.
